songs.title: Clarity
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: ILL Bill]

You can call me Genghis Khan

Broken home kids get loose for chains and kronz

[Verse 2: J-Love]

[Verse 3: Vinnie Paz]
I see things clear now, I'm a little older

I have clarity now

But that ain't never gonna happen

I'm tired of all y'all laughing
